alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Gonzales; Lavaca (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:34AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeWitt, east central Gonzales and Lavaca Counties through 830 AM CDT... At 733 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ezzell, or 11 miles east of Yoakum, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Yoakum, Hallettsville, Shiner, Moulton, Sublime, Ezzell, Hochheim, Speaks, Komensky, Worthing, Henkhaus, Edgar, Terryville, Vienna, Koerth, Moravia, Glaze City, Breslau, Nickle and Mont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
